text: Table 19-13. Select Attributes of the System.Text.Json.Serialization Namespace NET Attribute Meaning in Life [JsonIgnore] The property will be ignored. [IsonInclude] The member will be included. [IsonPropertyName] This specifies the property name to be used when serializing/deserializing a â€˜member. This is commonly used to resolve character casing issues. [IsonConstructor] This indicates the constructor that should be used when deserializing JSON back into an object graph.
